 ooc: Hey RD, can you answer my post with Blindfear/Perceptor plase?
  robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote: Megatron waited patiently. How to deal with his former troops. He
decided it best to deal with his current ones. "We are going to visit
some former comerades. Dominjoe, if you haven't met them, you have at
least heard of the Constructicons, and Soundwave. If they join us, all
the better, but if they are still part of that renegade Decepticons
group, then we shall obliterate them." he explained calmly.
